thread.title: Facebook is having issues for some users
thread.title_full: Facebook is having issues for some users

title: Facebook is having issues for some users
text:
Facebook is having issues for some users Last updated 23:11, February 22 2017 REGIS DUVIGNAU 
Facebook users all around the world reported trouble with their news feed - but not everyone seemed to be affected. 
Facebook appeared to hit the rocks on Wednesday night with users across the world reporting problems accessing their news feed. 
Down Detector showed a spike in reports of problems with the site from around 10:20pm. There were reports of issues around the world but a particular concentration in Europe. 
Some users said they couldn't scroll through posts and others hit an unusual message at the bottom of their feed. There was no immediate word from Facebook about what was causing the issues. @NZStuff #facebook is down people all over the world are reporting to me that the facebook feed is down. Do u know why? pic.twitter.com/obU2942DrG
